entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rocky Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Berry Hill 11:30 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -18.1°C
Wind: WSW 41 km/h gust 75 km/h

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
